_header: Yet came Jesu to the time ere he went to heaven
Note: For other MSS. which begin this section 44 lines earlier see 787 (formerly listed as 409).
_description: Section on the Ascension in the ‘Southern Resurrection’ of the South English Legendary — in couplets

CamTCC605.Transcription:
AC þo he com a knyte an hey a cloude hym ouer spraddeþat
                    folke na more hym ysey grete wonder hii hadde……hii were a wende
                    in to þe borȝ ne derst hii þan comefor drede of þe
                    gywes lest hii were ynome
CamTCC605.Facsimiles:
Digital Facsimile of Trinity College Cambridge MS R.3.25.
         https://mss-cat.trin.cam.ac.uk/Manuscript/R.3.25.
